text: imaan waalo! shaitaan ke qadam ba qadam na chalo, jo shaqs shaitaani qadmo ki pairvi kare, to wo to be hayaayi aur bure kaamo ka hee hukm karega aur agar Allah ta’ala ka fazl wa karam tum par na hota, to tum mein se koyi bhi kabi bhi paak saaf na hota, lekin Allah ta’ala jise paak karna chaahe kar deta hai aur Allah sab sunne wala aur sab jaane wala hai
